data.title: IGNTP - The International Greek New Testament Project
data.meta_description: The International Greek New Testament Project (IGNTP) oversees the production of scholarly editions of the books and manuscripts of the Greek New Testament. It was founded in 1948 and is currently collaborating on the Editio Critica Maior with particular responsibility for the Gospel according to John and Pauline Epistles.
data.text:
IGNTP Bibliography

The bibliography listed here pertains to the history of the IGNTP and is split into several sections. To go straight to a particular section, please use the table of contents below.

Table of Contents

Gospel of John: Reports and Methods

Gospel of Luke: Reports and Methods

Gospel of John Reviews

Papyrus Volume (1995)

Majuscule Volume (2008)

Gospel of Luke: Reviews (1983, 1987)

The Critical Greek Testament (precursor of the IGNTP)

History of the IGNTP
